headline: Cencora Closes $3.0 Billion Senior Notes Offering
summary: CONSHOHOCKEN, Pa., February 13, 2026--Cencora, Inc. (NYSE: COR) today announced the closing of its public offering of $500 million aggregate principal amount of its 3.950% Senior Notes due February 13, 2029 (the "2029 Notes"), $500 million aggregate principal amount of its 4.250% Senior Notes due November 15, 2030 (the "2030 Notes"), $500 million aggregate principal amount of its 4.600% Senior Notes due February 13, 2033 (the "2033 Notes"), $1.0 billion aggregate principal amount of its 4.900% S

headline: Barclays Maintains Overweight on Cencora, Raises Price Target to $425
summary: Barclays  analyst Glen Santangelo   maintains Cencora (NYSE:COR) with a Overweight and raises the price target from $400 to $425.
